page.title: 19THE VICAR OF RIDGE
page.content: FATHER ROBERT GAGE IS THE VICAR OF THE PARISHES OF RIDGE AND SOUTH MYMMS.USUALLY EVERY DAY OF THE WEEK IS VERY BUSY FOR HIM.FATHER GAGE GETS UP AT ABOUT 6:45 AM.HE LIVES IN THE VICARAGE NEXT TO ST.GILES CHURCH IN SOUTH MYMMS WHERE HE DOES MOST OF HIS SERVICES.ON A TUESDAY HE STARTS WITH MASS AT 7:15 FOLLOWED BY THE SCHOOL SERVICE.THE PUPILS OF THE LOCAL SCHOOL COME DOWN AND SING HYMNS,SAY PRAYERS AND LISTEN TO A SHORT PASSAGE FROM THE BIBLE.AFTER THE SERVICE THE VICAR VISITS SOME OF THE ELDERLY AND SICK IN THE VILLAGE TO GIVE THEM ADVICE AND COMFORT.BEFORE LUNCH THE VICAR SPENDS A LONG TIME ON THE PHONE HELPING PEOPLE WHO HAVE RUNG HIM THAT MORNING. IN THE AFTERNOON THE VICAR TAKES A RELIGION CLASS IN THE LOCAL SCHOOL.TOD AY HE HAS ARRANGED A VISIT TO ST.MARGARATES CHURCHIN RIDGE TO HELP
